sessions.description:
Saarang is the annual cultural festival of IIT Madras, and one of the top five best college festivals across the country. Over the years, Saarang has remained the preferred platform of an exhibition of culture, talent and competition for students from all over India, from the fields of dance, music, literature and more, all under one roof

For four days in January, IIT Madras is transformed into a hub of activity, with a large number of students, participants, and passers-by who enjoy the amalgam of events, food stalls, workshops and music shows. To the students of the institution and Chennai alike, Saarang is synonymous with culture, colour, fun, learning, and big names, big money, big dreams.

The pool of resources, great judges and opportunity it offers to young talent is a magnetic draw to students, while Chennai localites however, love Saarang for the yearly bonanza of big artistes from all over the world, performing at IIT as part of the professional and World Cultural shows. There is something for absolutely everybody, and we as we at Saarang say, this is truly the next Big Bang- see you at Saarang, for a truly out-of-the-world experience.
sessions.title: Saarang 2015

sessions.description:
Saarang IIT Madras presents two of the leading lights in the field of classical dance and music. Two women who have revolutionized the performing arts with their versatility and energy will grace the Open Air Theatre this January. Be there to see Padma Shri Aruna Sairam and Padma Shri Shobana enthral you.

Padma Shri Shobana Chandrakumar is an Indian film actress and Bharata Natyam dancer. Shobana was trained under the Bharata Natyam dancers Chitra Visweswaran and Padma Subrahmanyam. She emerged as an independent performer and choreographer in her twenties. Shobana danced Abhinaya, a pivotal element in Bharata Natyam. She has worked on collaborative ventures with the likes of tabla maestro Zakir Hussain, Vikku Vinayakram and Mandolin Srinivas. Her recitals abroad include those at the World Malayalee convention, United States, in Kuala Lumpur before the King and Queen of Malaysia and numerous other places. In 2006, the Indian Government honoured Shobana with the Padma Shri for her contributions towards the classical dance. In 2014, The Kerala Government honoured her with the Kala Ratna Award.

Padma Shri Aruna Sairam is an eminent Carnatic music vocalist. In concert she continually strives to deliver a unique experience through new repertoire. Aruna has had the rare distinction of performing in such venues as the Rashtrapati Bhavan, Shakthi Sthal and Vir Bhoomi. Aruna is one of her generation's pioneering vocalists in the sense of sensitising international audiences to the sound and feel of South Indian vocal music. The BBC Proms invited her to perform at London's Royal Albert Hall as the first South Indian classical vocalist in the Proms' history. Aruna has also performed at New York's Carnegie Hall, Theatre de la Ville in Paris and Morocco's Fes Festival of World Sacred Music. The awards with which she was honoured are Padma Shri from the Government of India and the Sangeet Natak Akademi Award, Government of India in 2014. Aruna Sairam has been appointed the Advisor to the Department of Culture, Tamil Nadu, on Musical Education by the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu.

Come, witness these stalwarts of Indian Classical Arts inaugurate Saarang 2015 on the star-studded opening night. Entry is free for all.
sessions.title: Classical Night - Shobana and Aruna Sairam

sessions.description:
TICKETS AT BOOKMYSHOW - SAARANG

Bring the music alive, unleash yourself, dance, dance and dance till you drop. Presenting the biggest inter-collegiate dance competition, Choreo Night Saarang, IIT Madras. #NextBigBang
sessions.title: Choreo Night

sessions.description:
TICKETS AT BOOKMYSHOW - SAARANG

IIT Madras gives you the headlining acts for the Vh1 Supersonic 101 EDM Night at Saarang 2015 to be held on January 9th, 2015 at the OAT.

Nucleya

He's back to perform at Saarang, bigger and with a whole new bunch of bells and whistles in his arsenal. One simply cannot resist partying when he drops those Desi beats. Till date, he remains the biggest phenomenon of Dubstep in the country. He has 14 singles, studio albums and collaborations to his name and has performed at numerous music festivals around the world.

Thermal Projekt

Their passion and love for music, bonds their personalities together. Known for winning hearts with their smashing remixes, mashups and originals earned the duo their massive popularity on Facebook and Twitter. They have often shared the stage with international greats. Most recently, they opened for Dada Life Concert in Bangalore.

Progressive Brothers

Their style and identity comprises of 'Big room' Progressive House and melodies of Trance Music with the trace of Electro in it. Their debut track 'Veda' was in collaboration with Trance legend 'Richard Durand'. They have also featured on compilations 'Trance-Central 003', 'Amsterdam Dance Essentials' and 'Heaven Trance' along with some Top DJs from DJ Mag Top 100 such as Cosmic Gate and Stoneface.

EDM Night, the latest addition to the pro-shows, has taken Saarang by storm and promises to be a spectacle worth experiencing!
sessions.title: EDM Night - Thermal Projekt, Nucleya, Progressive Brothers

sessions.description:
TICKETS AT BOOKMYSHOW - SAARANG

IIT Madras is proud to announce Karnivool as the headlining act for the Rock Show at Saarang 2015. Karnivool will be performing live for the first time in Chennai, at the IIT Madras Open Air Theatre on January 10th, 2015.

Karnivool is an Australian progressive rock band from Perth, Australia, critically hailed as being one of the bands that established the Australian progressive rock and metal movement. They are considered to be amongst the few in Australia's rapidly growing music industry to still be bringing new and refreshing material to their catalogue. The five-member band consists of Ian Kenny on vocals, Drew Goddard and Mark Hosking on guitar, Jon Stockman on bass, and Steve Judd on drums.
sessions.title: Rockshow - Karnivool

sessions.description:
TICKETS AT BOOKMYSHOW - SAARANG

Saarang 2015 presents the scintillating Sunidhi Chauhan performing live at Popular Night. She is set to perform at the OAT IIT Madras on January 11th 2015.

Sunidhi Chauhan is one of the most popular Indian playback singers and performers today. Her main claim to fame is her active role in the Bollywood music industry. With 1000s of studio recordings over a few years she rapidly became one of India's most recorded voices and a popular name. She has also recorded songs in several other dialects and languages, such as Punjabi, Marathi, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Bengali and English. She has been awarded with prestigious national awards on several occasions and has established herself as the strongest live performer and singer in India to date. Sunidhi Chauhan made her International debut with the song Heartbeat, a collaboration with Enrique Iglesias. Sunidhi stepped into the world of playback singing with the 1996 Bollywood film, Shastra, lending her voice to the song 'Larki Deewaani Dekho, Ladka Deewaana.' By the age of nineteen, Sunidhi had lent her voice to over 350 songs. With blockbuster hits like 'Dance pe Chance', 'Sheila ki Jawani', 'Aaja Nachle' and 'Crazy Kiya Re' her voice has defined Bollywood music over the past decade.

Sunidhi is one of the most decorated Indian singers with 54 nominations for best playback singer. Having won the 'Best Playback Singer' award from Filmfare, International Indian Film Academy, Star Screen, GIMA and several others 20 times, she is undoubtedly the most gifted Bollywood playback singer of the present era. Legendary playback singer Lata Mangeshkar described Sunidhi as the 'numero uno' female singer of today while Shankar Mahadevan referred to her as the 'Best female singer and live performer today.'With greats such as Sonu Nigam, Vishal-Shekhar, Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy, Salim-Sulaiman having rocked the OAT at IIT Madras in the past, one expects an exciting performance at Popular Night each year. Sunidhi Chauhan is set raise the bar further this year with a plethora of songs which are bound to keep the crowd on their feet all night long.

We missed the 'first big bang', let's not miss the 'next one' at Saarang 2015!
sessions.title: Popular Night - Sunidhi Chauhan

sessions.description:
Online registrations have closed. However, on-spot registrations will be opened at the time of the Prelims. Note: limited seats available.

We have all dreamt of going up on the stage and delivering a fabulous performance. It’s time to make that dream a reality.
Welcome to Monoacting, an event where you have the liberty to do whatever acting piece you want! But don’t think that your performance ends there…

Thanks to our association with Chilsag Entertainment Network, this event is being ressurected with fabulous incentives. Check the Prizes tab for more details.

sessions.description:
Although the deadline has passed, you may still submit your scripts. However, the acceptance of such submissions is at the complete discretion of the coordinators.

“Movies will make you famous. Television will make you rich. But theatre will make you good.”
-Terrence Mann

The stage is set, the curtains are drawn, and the spotlight is on you.
Come be a part of the magic that is theatre at Saarang’s Dramatics Event and let the drama begin.

Our tie-ups with Crea-Shakthi and Goethe Institut ensure incentivization like never before. With a prize money of 55K, free workshops and a chance to perform at MY Theatre Fest; Dramatics promises to be harder, tighter and more interesting.
sessions.title: Dramatics Prelims

sessions.description:
Want to send a message through your acting? Saarang gives you the audience of your dreams, as you perform to an enormous floating crowd, and take back prizes for making a change. Start that wave! Come do a street play at Saarang.

Once more, Saarang Street Play is collaborating with Teach for India (along with Chilsag Entertainment Network), and this has inspired our theme of "Education System in India". Street plays of participating teams are free to deal with any particular social issue under this umbrella.
sessions.title: Street Play

sessions.description:
OEKAKI - THE SKETCHING CONTEST

Have your fingers been itching for the familiar grip of the eternal HB pencils? 

Have you been going berserk to let your imagination flow in strokes and scribbles?

Hear Ye Lost Souls!

Saarang Fine Arts 2015 presents, OEKAKI- The Sketching Contest

Sound Familiar? Yep its time sketch with a dash of color folks! The good old Sketching Contest is back!
sessions.title: Oekaki - The Sketching Contest

sessions.description:
CLAY SCULPTING WORKSHOP

 

A dab here. A tweak there.

And Voila! You have a clay sculpture!

Clay is one of the most impressionable mediums in art. What can you not make with clay? An apple? An Oscar Idol? What about something even as abstract as a pit of flames?

Come with your friends and discover the wonders of moulding clay into your dreams at Saarang Fine Arts 2015!
sessions.title: Clay Sculpting Workshop

sessions.description:
FACE PAINTING

You can be Joker. You can be Catwoman. Or Just a fierce Tribal!

Oh yes, you can be whoever you want and sail away with a prize. It’s a win-win situation guys, so come and join us at The Face Painting Contest presented to you by Saarang Fine Arts 2015!

We aren’t on an undercover identity-destruction mission, so we will ensure completely organic and safe paints for your delicate skins!  All you need is lots of enthusiasm and of course a friend who is willing to trust you with their face!
sessions.title: Face Painting

sessions.description:
FINGER PAINTING

This is the finger painting event where you slip, slide your fingers with gooey colors! Sounds like a funny combination? Finger painting is simply painting with fingers, and instead of using a brush, you dip your fingers in paint.

Come join us at Saarang Fine Arts 2015 and change the look of your paintings by smearing or blending colours with your fingers!
sessions.title: Finger painting

sessions.description:
POSTER MAKING

Time for some good old back-to-school feel.                                                                          

Saarang Fine Arts 2015 presents, “The Poster Making Contest”

All ye social enthusiasts, and ye current affairs hogs, look out!            

And of course, for those with a funny bone we will have a plethora of interesting themes too!                                                                          

Drag your friends along and win exciting prizes!
sessions.title: Poster Making

sessions.description:
The classical arts are an integral part of our country’s rich heritage, and we at Saarang strongly believe in encouraging these profound art forms. Saarang 2015 presents you with the thrilling opportunity to showcase your talent in the classical arts of India; be it with the rhythmic beats of Bharathanatyam or the melodious tunes of Carnatic music. Come! Participate in one or more of the 5 events Saarang Classical Arts has to offer and take home with you exciting gifts and prizes!

Classical arts at Saarang this year witnesses a revival of sorts with a plethora of events to arouse your interest and appeal to the classical connoisseur in you. With better competition, judges and prizes, mesmerize everyone with your prowess. The classical music event is divided into two categories: vocals and instrumentals (percussion and non-percussion), whereas the dance event comprises of a solo event and a group event. If you can’t resist dancing to the taalams or humming the raga, Classical arts at Saarang is the place for you.
sessions.title: Solo Dance Prelims

sessions.title: Instrumentals

sessions.description: “Raw, pure and sensile blend of voices, percussion, and strings”. Quaint and poignant, LM Unplugged  is here to unleash a whole new world of music, devoid of electronic instruments and sounds. A light music band event, Unplugged  is for the unconventional talents out there.  Catapult yourself where there are no distortions or pre-processing. Be it the packed audience, exciting prizes and expert judges  for all music lovers out there, Unplugged is the place to be!
sessions.title: Unplugged

sessions.description: Saarang gives you a platform to get out there and win hearts with your vocal talent. This solo singing competition in 2 stages pushes you to discover the best in you. Held in one of the best venues on campus, Vox is definitely a great stage for aspiring vocalists to showcase their talent.
sessions.title: Vox Prelims

sessions.description:
Just can’t get enough out of that overpowered vocal engine?

Ever compared your oratory skills to Mark Anthony and come away smiling?

Can your vocal wizardry bring back the dead from their graves?

Can your verbal swagger sway a crowd better than Mick Jagger?

If your answer is a ‘Yes’ to any of the above questions, please do turn up for “Elocution”.
sessions.title: Elocution

sessions.description:
Silence. Anticipation. And buzz! Presenting the Saarang Buzzer quiz - replete with an all-new knockout format for the finals. With every question on the buzzer, teams are constantly in a do or die situation that will leave you on the edge of your seats, breathlessly waiting for the next question. Will you buzz and risk it all, or play it safe? 


Come to IIT Madras and pit yourself against other quizzing stalwarts from across the city and country at a quiz that will leave you buzzing with excitement.

Please note that:

Saarang Quizzes are open to full-time students from all disciplines.

The quiz is open to students from institutes that are affiliated to universities or are universities themselves.

It is NOT open for students from courses run by professional associations such as ICAI, ICSI etc. This list is merely indicative and NOT exhaustive.
sessions.title: Buzzer Quiz Finals

sessions.description:
Make a mark this Saarang at one of the biggest college band competitions in the country. Fame, glory, fans, and most importantly a celebration of your music - watch it all work on your accord at Powerchords. It's your turn to strike a chord.

Registration deadline extended to 10th December 2014.
sessions.title: Powerchords Prelims

sessions.description:
Online registrations have closed. However, on-spot registrations will be opened at the time of the Prelims. Note: limited seats available.

We have all dreamt of going up on the stage and delivering a fabulous performance. It’s time to make that dream a reality.
Welcome to Monoacting, an event where you have the liberty to do whatever acting piece you want! But don’t think that your performance ends there…

Thanks to our association with Chilsag Entertainment Network, this event is being ressurected with fabulous incentives. Check the Prizes tab for more details.

sessions.description: Salsa, Bachata, Samba, Jiving etc. Come and grove to the rhythm of these dance forms and learn from the masters themselves! For all the dance enthusiasts out there, this is your chance to let go and have the time of your life. All for free!
sessions.title: Dance Workshops Salsa

sessions.description:
Hold yourselves, as the hues of Saarang breathes life into the worldly realm of imagination. This time, we bring before you Anita Nair, one of the most crafty contemporary Indian writers in English. Her more popular books include, ‘The Better Man’ and ‘Ladies Coupe’. The latter was rated among the top five books of the year in 2002. Her latest novel, ‘Idris: Keeper of the Light’ has been shortlisted for the Hindu Literary Award. She has held critical acclaim for her smooth style by which she casts an exotic effect coupled with great insight into the comforting monotony of a familiar background.

Grab a seat on 8th January 2015 in the halls of IITM. It’s a ride into the enchanted.
sessions.title: Anita Nair

With every question on the buzzer, teams are constantly in a do or die situation that will leave you on the edge of your seats, breathlessly waiting for the next question. sessions.description:
Do you think money makes the world go round? Are you obsessed with corporate entities? Are the Economic Times and the Hindu Business Line your major sources of news? If yes, Saarang Biz Quiz is just right for you. Seeing an appearance in Saarang's lineup of quizzes after 4 years, this quiz will see questions on anything with even a remote business connect.

 

Note:

1. Saarang Quizzes are open to full-time students from all disciplines.

2. The quiz is open to students from institutes that are affiliated to universities or are universities themselves.

3. It is NOT open for students from courses run by professional associations such as ICAI, ICSI etc. This list is merely indicative and NOT exhaustive.
sessions.title: Business Quiz Prelims

Do you think money makes the world go round? Are you obsessed with corporate entities? Are the Economic Times and the Hindu Business Line your major sources of news? sessions.description: Do you know what Zyzzva is? Do AA, ZA and XI make perfect sense to you? Got vocabulary that will QUIZZIFY your opponent? Then Scrabble at Saarang is just the place for you! Have no clue what those words meant? Fret not, if you can spell, you can play Scrabble. Just grab a partner and come battle it out for Scrabble glory. May the Q be with U!
sessions.title: Scrabble Prelims

sessions.description: Are you a SUDOKU enthusiast? It's never been so easy to make money. No age bars, no prerequisites you just need to walk in, play with numbers. Unleash the logic master within you to crack the solutions, no luck. Fun guaranteed....
sessions.title: Sudoku Prelims

sessions.description: Music needs no words. Let your instrument do the talking at Sonata, Saarang’s solo instrumental event. Stimulated by a wonderful atmosphere, this event is a must for those who wish to display their talent at a higher level.
sessions.title: Sonata

sessions.description:
OEKAKI - THE SKETCHING CONTEST

Have your fingers been itching for the familiar grip of the eternal HB pencils? 

Have you been going berserk to let your imagination flow in strokes and scribbles?

Hear Ye Lost Souls!

Saarang Fine Arts 2015 presents, OEKAKI- The Sketching Contest

Sound Familiar? Yep its time sketch with a dash of color folks! The good old Sketching Contest is back!
sessions.title: Oekaki - The Sketching Contest

sessions.description: A heady concoction of fun and games, Potpourri has a little something for everybody. Dumb Charades, 20 Questions, Pictionary and a lot more rounds devised to draw out the pop culture geeks within us all. Now you can win money with skills developed over years of whiling away time in classrooms. Drag along your friends, and we promise to drown you in oodles of fun!
sessions.title: Potpourri

sessions.title: Vocals Finals

sessions.description: Tarang, the flagship light music band event for college students, is back, and is bigger and better this Saarang! Get ready to grab the spotlight on the Tarang stage which has been the springboard for the glittering careers of the current crop of great musicians like Anirudh Ravichander, Aalap Raju and Karthik, to name a few. It has gone on from being one of the biggest and most awaited events in Saarang to becoming one of the best band events in the country with versatile participants from all over the nation. Be it the packed audience, exciting prizes, expert judges or the bands fighting it out in a bid to showcase their music on a platform as huge as the OAT, for all music lovers out there, Tarang is the place to be!
sessions.title: Tarang Prelims

sessions.description:
Make a mark this Saarang at one of the biggest college band competitions in the country. Fame, glory, fans, and most importantly a celebration of your music - watch it all work on your accord at Powerchords. It's your turn to strike a chord.

Registration deadline extended to 10th December 2014.
sessions.title: Powerchords Finals

sessions.description: Nothing like a Dance Battle. And nothing like $TREET$ when it comes to B-Boying and Freestyle. $TREET$ is one of the biggest B-Boying and Freestyle events in India. Teams will be judged by the best B-Boys in the world like HAVIKORO, B-Boy GONZA ,B-Boy SPICE and B-Boy CHINO. If you have the moves to make people look on in awe, whether as a team or as an individual, this is the place to be! So join us at this dynamic stage as the voltage is turned high and the stage is charged. Be there!
sessions.title: $treet$

sessions.description: Salsa, Bachata, Samba, Jiving etc. Come and grove to the rhythm of these dance forms and learn from the masters themselves! For all the dance enthusiasts out there, this is your chance to let go and have the time of your life. All for free!
sessions.title: Dance Workshops

sessions.description:
‘The world speaks to me in colours, my soul answers in music’

If words may fail, Saarang hails with great pride, the legendary Indian Carnatic musician and Academy Award Nominee for Best Original Song (2013), Bombay Jayashri, to cast her charm over the very spirit of IITM. She has traversed all over the world, led dozens of concerts and music festivals, exploring different dimensions of the raga, leaving a glittery trail of accolades all the way. Her love of the lyric is embodied in her work with institutions probing into the healing power of melody.

Seize a seat on 9th January 2015. If this isn’t magic, nothing is!
sessions.title: Bombay Jayashri

sessions.description:
This year Saarang, IIT Madras brings you, Pullela Gopichand, the celebrated Indian badminton player. The second Indian to achieve the coveted All England Open Badminton Championships, he has been showered with the Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna Award, Dronacharya Award and the Padma Bhushan. Bent on nurturing a generation of capable sportsmen in India, he is known for founding the Pullela Gopichand Badminton Academy which has sprouted gems like Saina Nehwal, Parupalli Kashyap and Pusarla Venkata Sindhu.

Be sure to make yourselves present on 9th January in the halls of IIT Madras and get ready to be amazed!
sessions.title: Pullela Gopichand

sessions.description: You will be asked whether you have heard of a certain sportsperson who is idolised by his fans. But if you haven't heard of him/her, don't worry, nobody is going to deface your Facebook. Add to that questions about black and white movies of then, the special effects of today, the gramophone records of the previous generation and today's SoundCloud generation, and you are going to have one of the most memorable college quizzes of your life.
sessions.title: SpEnt Quiz

sessions.description: Do you consider yourself an anagram virtuoso? Are you more of a walking-talking thesaurus? Or do you generally have a way with words? At Saarang 2015 we present you with the opportunity to prove that you are indeed a master of vocabulary and wordplay. Dazzle us with your stellar word power and saunter away with fabulous prizes.
sessions.title: What's The Good Word Prelims

sessions.description: Are you a SUDOKU enthusiast? It's never been so easy to make money. No age bars, no prerequisites you just need to walk in, play with numbers. Unleash the logic master within you to crack the solutions, no luck. Fun guaranteed....
sessions.title: Sudoku Prelims

sessions.description:
The on-spot event consists of two rounds, with the first round being generic prompt-based written round with a word limit but no time limit. Second round has two parts- a written prompt and an audio round. There is no word limit but genre restriction and time limit given.

The Saarang On-Spot Creative Writing event takes place as two rounds. There is no pre-registration required. Keep an eye for the event dates!
sessions.title: Onsite Creative Writing

sessions.description: If you are looking for an event to prove your mettle as an individual vocalist, Alankar is here. A solo singing competition which sees the participation of more than a hundred talented voices every year, Alankar is one of the most sought after events in Saarang. Packed with challenges to test your versatility and your love for music, this is not something to be missed, even for bathroom singers.
sessions.title: Alankar Finals

sessions.description:
The on-spot event consists of two rounds, with the first round being generic prompt-based written round with a word limit but no time limit. Second round has two parts- a written prompt and an audio round. There is no word limit but genre restriction and time limit given.

The Saarang On-Spot Creative Writing event takes place as two rounds. There is no pre-registration required. Keep an eye for the event dates!
sessions.title: Onsite Creative Writing

sessions.description: These alliterative accomplices are all you need to set the stage on fire! Get the audience hooked on to every note as in reverberates through the hall with Acoustyx, Saarang's exclusive acoustic band competition; or better - woo the crowd with the magic of pure vocals at our very own Acappella singing event.
sessions.title: Acoustyx

sessions.description: Woo the crowd with the magic of pure vocals at our very own Acappella singing event. Who needs instruments when you've got the power of your mellifluous vocals? Harmonize, sing out loud, clap and snap. Saarang's Acappella singing event is for all those college Acappella groups who have been awaiting their chance to show off their skills. Saarang's Acappella has seen kickass groups from around the country battle it out on the stage with their voices. Don't miss your turn!
sessions.title: Acapella

sessions.description:
JAM is neither your regular annoying main road traffic monstrosity nor is it your bread’s greatest companion. This is “Just A Minute”.  

Having a cool head when it matters is good, not making grammatical errors is better, wit and humour slipping off your tongue is best. Now if you think you can be outrageous enough to combine these three superpowers together, at least for a minute, well then we have a stage for you.
sessions.title: JAM Finals

sessions.description: Do you know what Zyzzva is? Do AA, ZA and XI make perfect sense to you? Got vocabulary that will QUIZZIFY your opponent? Then Scrabble at Saarang is just the place for you! Have no clue what those words meant? Fret not, if you can spell, you can play Scrabble. Just grab a partner and come battle it out for Scrabble glory. May the Q be with U!
sessions.title: Scrabble Finals

sessions.description:
JAM is neither your regular annoying main road traffic monstrosity nor is it your bread’s greatest companion. This is “Just A Minute”.  

Having a cool head when it matters is good, not making grammatical errors is better, wit and humour slipping off your tongue is best. Now if you think you can be outrageous enough to combine these three superpowers together, at least for a minute, well then we have a stage for you.
sessions.title: JAM Prelims

sessions.description:
FACE PAINTING

You can be Joker. You can be Catwoman. Or Just a fierce Tribal!

Oh yes, you can be whoever you want and sail away with a prize. It’s a win-win situation guys, so come and join us at The Face Painting Contest presented to you by Saarang Fine Arts 2015!

We aren’t on an undercover identity-destruction mission, so we will ensure completely organic and safe paints for your delicate skins!  All you need is lots of enthusiasm and of course a friend who is willing to trust you with their face!
sessions.title: Face Painting

sessions.description:
The classical arts are an integral part of our country’s rich heritage, and we at Saarang strongly believe in encouraging these profound art forms. Saarang 2015 presents you with the thrilling opportunity to showcase your talent in the classical arts of India; be it with the rhythmic beats of Bharathanatyam or the melodious tunes of Carnatic music. Come! Participate in one or more of the 5 events Saarang Classical Arts has to offer and take home with you exciting gifts and prizes!

Classical arts at Saarang this year witnesses a revival of sorts with a plethora of events to arouse your interest and appeal to the classical connoisseur in you. With better competition, judges and prizes,mesmerize everyone with your prowess. The classical music event is divided into two categories: vocals and instrumentals (percussion and non-percussion), whereas the dance event comprises of a solo event and a group event. If you can’t resist dancing to the taalams or humming the raga, Classical arts at Saarang is the place for you.
sessions.title: Instrumentals Percussion and Non Percussion

sessions.description:
Roadshows at Saarang, aims to entertain you with a series of professional performances right on the streets of the beautiful IIT Madras campus, free of cost!

We get the finest performers of the country to keep you entertained. We promise you a wide variety of shows this Saarang! The shows are definitely worth waiting for!

 

Stay tuned...!
sessions.title: Roadshows Team 8e BMX

sessions.description:
Roadshows at Saarang, aims to entertain you with a series of professional performances right on the streets of the beautiful IIT Madras campus, free of cost!

sessions.description:
Although the deadline has passed, you may still submit your scripts. However, the acceptance of such submissions is at the complete discretion of the coordinators.

“Movies will make you famous. Television will make you rich. But theatre will make you good.”
-Terrence Mann

The stage is set, the curtains are drawn, and the spotlight is on you.
Come be a part of the magic that is theatre at Saarang’s Dramatics Event and let the drama begin.

Our tie-ups with Crea-Shakthi and Goethe Institut ensure incentivization like never before. With a prize money of 55K, free workshops and a chance to perform at MY Theatre Fest; Dramatics promises to be harder, tighter and more interesting.
sessions.title: Dramatics Stage Play - Finals

Roadshows at Saarang, aims to entertain you with a series of professional performances right on the streets of the beautiful IIT Madras campus, free of cost!

Then Saarang crossie is an event you cannot miss. Grab a partner, gulp down your coffee, and show up with your hair in a braid.
sessions.title: Crossie Prelims

sessions.description: Tarang, the flagship light music band event for college students, is back, and is bigger and better this Saarang! Get ready to grab the spotlight on the Tarang stage which has been the springboard for the glittering careers of the current crop of great musicians like Anirudh Ravichander, Aalap Raju and Karthik, to name a few. It has gone on from being one of the biggest and most awaited events in Saarang to becoming one of the best band events in the country with versatile participants from all over the nation. Be it the packed audience, exciting prizes, expert judges or the bands fighting it out in a bid to showcase their music on a platform as huge as the OAT, for all music lovers out there, Tarang is the place to be!
sessions.title: Tarang Finals

sessions.description:
Want to send a message through your acting? Saarang gives you the audience of your dreams, as you perform to an enormous floating crowd, and take back prizes for making a change. Start that wave! Come do a street play at Saarang.

Once more, Saarang Street Play is collaborating with Teach for India (along with Chilsag Entertainment Network), and this has inspired our theme of "Education System in India". Street plays of participating teams are free to deal with any particular social issue under this umbrella.
sessions.title: Street Play

Think it’s time for your band to be launched into the limelight? Think you have what it takes to compete against some of the best bands in the country? Then waste no time and sign your band up for Saarang Decibels 2014, one of India’s premier competitions for semi-professional bands to make your claim to fame.

 

REGISTRATION DEADLINE EXTENDED TO 27TH NOVEMBER!

Catering to a class of music which has grown immensely popular all around the world ,this event is definitely one to keep an eye out for. Conducted in a DJ face-off format, this event is lets aspiring DJs entertain the crowds to get them dancing to their mixes and grooves.

sessions.description:
Behind the sleek, nuanced script of the gilded screen, lies the toil of several men. Saarang 2015 unfolds its carpets for one such talented artist, Ritesh Batra, an Indian film director and screenwriter. His fame mostly rests on his work as the writer, director and executive producer of ‘The Lunchbox’, which was premiered at the Cannes Critics Week section in 2013. He is celebrated for his intricate and exquisite rendering of the ordinary.

Keep an eye out for 11th January 2015, it’s wonder all over.
sessions.title: Ritesh Batra

sessions.description: Salsa, Bachata, Samba, Jiving etc. Come and grove to the rhythm of these dance forms and learn from the masters themselves! For all the dance enthusiasts out there, this is your chance to let go and have the time of your life. All for free!
sessions.title: Dance Workshops Dance Workshop -4

sessions.description:
Have you ever experienced the feeling of going out of the world? Never really got a chance? It is time to experience something crazy, thrilling and spine-chilling, with sensational and electrifying moments, the Adventure zone gives you all.

Come and take over the Ad zone, let adrenaline take over you and take home some of the most enduring and everlasting experiences of your life. . Experience pure nirvana in adrenaline zone. Team or undaunted personage, we have just got right event for you.
sessions.title: Adrenaline Zone

sessions.description:
“Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street, fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.”

We bring to you Panache - The Style and Fashion Show at Saarang! This season, experience the Next Big Bang in fashion as budding designers and models fight it out in a bid to make their own style statement. With exciting cash prizes, vouchers and much much more in store, get ready for a show bursting with flair and pizzazz! So this Saarang, let creativity, fashion and glamour defy all earthly constraints as you take it out of the world!

 

Prize money and lots of exciting vouchers to be won!
sessions.title: Panache

sessions.description: Fancy yourself something of a wordsmith? Do you reach for the Hindu crossword as you have your morning coffee? Do word puzzles always keep you well entertained? Then Saarang crossie is an event you cannot miss. Grab a partner, gulp down your coffee, and show up with your hair in a braid.
sessions.title: Crossie Finals

sessions.description:
From the towering mountains in the north, to the flat sandy beaches of the south, here comes a journey from top to bottom, and everything in between.

Saarang India Quiz.
sessions.title: India Quiz Prelims

sessions.description:
Ever wondered when you would be able to awe people with your awesome, albeit unkown, talents?

Think you can be the face of Saarang?

Are you an arrogant ******* who wants to upstage others on stage?

If you've answered yes to any of the above, we have the solution:

Come participate in Mr. and Ms. Saarang and drench the world with your awesomesauce.
sessions.title: Mr and Ms Saarang

sessions.description:
From the towering mountains in the north, to the flat sandy beaches of the south, here comes a journey from top to bottom, and everything in between.

Saarang India Quiz.
sessions.title: India Quiz Finals

sessions.description: For those who chose to define themselves through their moves; for those, who love spreading the joy of life through their dance. For those of you who have always awaited an opportunity to express yourself and show people your true self. Look no further. Saarang 2015 presents to you – Freestyle solo. A platform which let's you paint the world around you through your unique style and unleash the beast of dancing within yourself. So come and dance your heart away.
sessions.title: Freestyle Solo

sessions.description:
T-SHIRT PAINTING WORKSHOP

“I dream my painting, and then I paint my dream”

Well painting isn’t just for paper anymore and the most adorable T-shirts are the ones painted!

So put two and two together and we have the T-Shirt painting workshop presented to you by Saarang Fine Arts 2015!

It’s time to create something beautiful for you to wear! :)
sessions.title: T-shirt Painting Workshop

sessions.description:
Roadshows at Saarang, aims to entertain you with a series of professional performances right on the streets of the beautiful IIT Madras campus, free of cost!

We get the finest performers of the country to keep you entertained. We promise you a wide variety of shows this Saarang! The shows are definitely worth waiting for!

 

Stay tuned...!
sessions.title: Roadshows BMX Stunt

sessions.description:
Exhausted all the mysterious cases of Agatha Christie and Sir Arthur Conan Doyle? Do codes, puzzles and mystery enthrall you?  If yes, get ready to do a Sherlock or a Marple at Saarang's unique mystery solving event- ClueDo - a sui generis but an all inclusive event ! 

Be warned though, this will get you addicted to mysteries !
sessions.title: ClueDo Finals

sessions.description: If you are looking for an event to prove your mettle as an individual vocalist, Alankar is here. A solo singing competition which sees the participation of more than a hundred talented voices every year, Alankar is one of the most sought after events in Saarang. Packed with challenges to test your versatility and your love for music, this is not something to be missed, even for bathroom singers.
sessions.title: Alankar Prelims

sessions.title: Sudoku Finals

A solo singing competition which sees the participation of more than a hundred talented voices every year, Alankar is one of the most sought after events in Saarang. Packed with challenges to test your versatility and your love for music, this is not something to be missed, even for bathroom singers.
sessions.title: Alankar Semi Finals

sessions.description:
POSTER MAKING

Time for some good old back-to-school feel.                                                                          

Saarang Fine Arts 2015 presents, “The Poster Making Contest”

All ye social enthusiasts, and ye current affairs hogs, look out!            

And of course, for those with a funny bone we will have a plethora of interesting themes too!                                                                          

Drag your friends along and win exciting prizes!
sessions.title: Poster Making

sessions.description:
Be it a hum or hymn, music ever captivates and sways the hearts of all men.

This time, Saarang brings forth, the Indian film sound designer, editor and mixer, Resul Pookutty. Academy Award Winner for Best Sound Mixing for the movie ‘Slumdog Millionaire’ in 2008, he has, since, made his presence felt in Hollywood, Hindi, Tamil and Malayalam films. Mesmerizing millions and blending effortlessly richness and delicacy onto the screen, he has been shimmered with the Padma Shri and the 2010 National Award for Best Audiography for his work in ‘Pazhassi Raja’.

Catch him live at Saarang on 10th January 2015.
sessions.title: Resul Pookutty

sessions.description: The woman behind the wonderful movies Bangalore Days and Ustad Hotel,Anjali Menon is here before you. Her movie Manjadikuru has won international acclaims and her movie Ustad Hotel fetched her the National Award for best screenplay. Catch her live at Saarang, IIT Madras on 10th January, 2015.You definitely don't want to miss this!
sessions.title: Anjali Menon

sessions.description:
Have you ever experienced the feeling of going out of the world? Never really got a chance? It is time to experience something crazy, thrilling and spine-chilling, with sensational and electrifying moments, the Adventure zone gives you all.

Come and take over the Ad zone, let adrenaline take over you and take home some of the most enduring and everlasting experiences of your life. . Experience pure nirvana in adrenaline zone. Team or undaunted personage, we have just got right event for you.
sessions.title: Adrenaline Zone Laser Tag, Water Zorbing ,Air Rifles, Archery

sessions.description:
Online registrations have closed. However, on-spot registrations will be opened at the time of the Prelims. Note: limited seats available.

We have all dreamt of going up on the stage and delivering a fabulous performance. It’s time to make that dream a reality.
Welcome to Monoacting, an event where you have the liberty to do whatever acting piece you want! But don’t think that your performance ends there…

Thanks to our association with Chilsag Entertainment Network, this event is being ressurected with fabulous incentives. Check the Prizes tab for more details.
sessions.title: Mono Acting Finals

sessions.description:
A single person quiz. Written prelims, followed by a pre-final round for the top 16 qualifiers, followed by finals for the top 8.

Do you have it in you to survive an entire night of quizzing? Under the starry skies in the Open Air Theatre of IIT Madras, be a part of the event that crowns the king of college quizzing in India. 

Eligibility for this quiz:

1. Saarang Quizzes are open to full-time students from all disciplines.

2. The quiz is open to students from institutes that are affiliated to universities or are universities themselves.

3. It is NOT open for students from courses run by professional associations such as ICAI, ICSI etc. This list is merely indicative and NOT exhaustive.
sessions.title: Lonewolf Prelims

sessions.title: Street Sports Blind Basketball, Four Square

sessions.description: A heady concoction of fun and games, Potpourri has a little something for everybody. Dumb Charades, 20 Questions, Pictionary and a lot more rounds devised to draw out the pop culture geeks within us all. Now you can win money with skills developed over years of whiling away time in classrooms. Drag along your friends, and we promise to drown you in oodles of fun!
sessions.title: Potpourri Finals

sessions.description:
Have you ever experienced the feeling of going out of the world? Never really got a chance? It is time to experience something crazy, thrilling and spine-chilling, with sensational and electrifying moments, the Adventure zone gives you all.

Come and take over the Ad zone, let adrenaline take over you and take home some of the most enduring and everlasting experiences of your life. . Experience pure nirvana in adrenaline zone. Team or undaunted personage, we have just got right event for you.

sessions.description: Are you a SUDOKU enthusiast? It's never been so easy to make money. No age bars, no prerequisites you just need to walk in, play with numbers. Unleash the logic master within you to crack the solutions, no luck. Fun guaranteed....
sessions.title: Sudoku Prelims

sessions.description:
FINGER PAINTING

This is the finger painting event where you slip, slide your fingers with gooey colors! Sounds like a funny combination? Finger painting is simply painting with fingers, and instead of using a brush, you dip your fingers in paint.

Come join us at Saarang Fine Arts 2015 and change the look of your paintings by smearing or blending colours with your fingers!
sessions.title: Finger painting

sessions.description:
CLAY SCULPTING WORKSHOP

 

A dab here. A tweak there.

And Voila! You have a clay sculpture!

Clay is one of the most impressionable mediums in art. What can you not make with clay? An apple? An Oscar Idol? What about something even as abstract as a pit of flames?

Come with your friends and discover the wonders of moulding clay into your dreams at Saarang Fine Arts 2015!
sessions.title: Clay Sculpting Workshop

sessions.description:
ABOUT

Cinema is the most complex and powerful art form in the present world. It can help us to better understand our own lives, the lives of those around us and even how our society and culture operate. They can shed light on political and spiritual matters too and can provide catharsis and perspective and may open our eyes to new ways of thinking, feeling and pursuing our lives. University students are the most important part for the future of India. In all the important stages of our history, students played a vital role. It is through this beauty of ‘man-made’ art, called cinema that we’re able to connect to each other. Here, at Saarang, we wish to relive a dream where you are the creators of a dream world. Let the magic happen!
sessions.title: Short Film Making Saarang Film Festival

A single person quiz. Written prelims, followed by a pre-final round for the top 16 qualifiers, followed by finals for the top 8.
